Sentence.sentence: Yet there are doubts whether people watching television, a lean back medium, crave interaction.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Even when children are not directly rewarded or punished for "behaving like boys" or "behaving like girls," they learn about gender by watching who does what in their families.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I never read any magazines or watch TV," he said, perhaps with a little exaggeration.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Obama's success isn't all good news for black Americans As Erin White watched the election results head towards victory for Barack Obama, she felt a burden lifting from her shoulders
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Those who had watched Obama's acceptance speech as the Democrats' presidential candidate performed just as well, on average, as the white subjects
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: If scholars suddenly discovered that Rembrandt had dashed off "The Night Watch" in an afternoon, it would still be "The Night Watch.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I guess you watch the quiz show on television last night.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I almost missed it, but my mother just happened to be watching at home and gave me a call.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The baby watches a sort of show on a small stage.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The man could watch the ballet with her.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He doesn't like watching sports programs.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He watches TV programs only selectively.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The writer can stand aside from experience and look at it, watch it happening.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The speakers will watch the game together.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I guess I'll just watch it on TOne great challenge for the U.S. economy is slack domestic consumer demand. Americans are paying down debt, saving more, and spending more carefully.content>
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Bria Dunham, a mother in Somerville, Massachusetts, was so excited to watch a moment of brotherly bonding while her first-grader and baby took a bath together that she snapped a few photos.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: In the first study, three-year-olds watch two videos shown side by side.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: It's funny you ask that because I never have this moment when I feel, "Ah, I've finished!" I watch footballers at the end of the match, you know, the whistle goes and they've won or lost.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Now, instead of swimming upstream, we relax, sleep, watch movies, or listen to music.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

means: watch ： 指用眼睛跟随某物，以便对每一个变化、运动等进行观察。
observe ： 侧重以客观的态度进行观察。
witness ： 指当场看见，亲眼看见。

example.en: What's the dog watch after midnight today?

Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: An educational program is best watched by a child with his parents.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语广东卷 阅读理解 阅读C 题设

Sentence.sentence: As I watch her chase after a squirrel, throwing her whole being into the here-and-now of an exercise that has never once ended in victory.

Sentence.sentence: Because we can watch the neighbours react.

Sentence.sentence: But according to Anderson, the amount of time spent watching television is not related to reading ability.

Sentence.sentence: By the way, did you watch that special TV program last night?

Sentence.sentence: By watching TV, children learn more than explicit meanings.

Sentence.sentence: Furthermore, as many teachers agree, children understand far more when parents watch TV with them, explaining new words and ideas.

Sentence.sentence: It won an Oscar in 2006, and if you watch it, you'll understand why.

Sentence.sentence: Little Tom sat amazed watching the monkey dancing in front of him.

sentences.en: She sat there watching, but said nothing.
sentences.cn: 她坐在那里看着, 但没说什么。

sentences.cn: 我通常在晚上看电视。

sentences.en: Just watch what will happen when I press the button.
sentences.cn: 看着, 我按按钮会发生什么事情。

sentences.en: She watched the children play table tennis.
sentences.cn: 她看孩子们打乒乓球。

sentences.en: Many people like to watch others playing games.
sentences.cn: 许多人喜欢看别人比赛。

means.word_mean: 守卫[保护], 留心, 注视

sentences.en: The nurse watched to see what would happen.
sentences.cn: 护士注意着会发生什么情况。

sentences.en: She watched his face anxiously.
sentences.cn: 她焦急地注视着他的脸。

sentences.en: Watch that he doesn't cheat you.
sentences.cn: 注意别让他骗了你。

sentences.en: The policemen watched the guy for several days.
sentences.cn: 警察监视那家伙好几天了。

means.word_mean: 照看；照料(婴儿等)；看管(羊群等)

sentences.en: The girl watched the baby yesterday afternoon.
sentences.cn: 女孩昨天下午照看了小宝宝。

sentences.en: Keep a close watch on everything that happened on the island.
sentences.cn: 密切注视岛上发生的一切事情。

sentences.en: The night watch comes on duty soon.
sentences.cn: 值夜班的人很快就要来值班了。

sentences.en: He wears a gold watch.
sentences.cn: 他戴了一块金表。

means.word_mean: 手表，怀表；挂表壳上系表链的环
值夜班；整夜守护(或照顾)

sentences.en: The nurse watched in front of the sick man's bed for many nights.
sentences.cn: 护士在这病人床前守候好几夜了。

data.mean: watch for sb/sth 观察等待（某人出现或发生某事）
watch out 小心；留神；注意

jx.jx_en_mean: be carefully looking out for something, especially a possible danger
stay on the lookout for danger or trouble
protect oneself (or someone else) against danger from an unexpected quarter
jx.jx_cn_mean: 保护自己（或他人）（以防意外的危险）

jx.jx_en_mean: (poetic/literary)the hours of night, portrayed as a time when one cannot sleep
ensure that one is aware of the time in order to avoid being late
spend time observing other people going about their business
To be careful or on the alert; take care.
To be in charge of; superintend.

lj.lj_ly: had to watch it when I stepped onto the ice.
lj.lj_ls: 当我走上冰面就不得不留神了

jx.jx_en_mean: To act or proceed with care and caution.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 谨慎行事：小心谨慎地行动或前进

jx.jx_en_mean: To behave as is demanded, required, or appropriate.

entry.def: If you watch someone or something, you look at them, usually for a period of time, and pay attention to what is happening.

example.ex: The man was standing in his doorway watching him...
example.tran: 那个男人站在门口盯着他看。

example.ex: He watched the barman prepare the beer he had ordered...
example.tran: 他看着酒吧招待员备好他点的啤酒。

entry.def: If you watch something on television or an event such as a sports match, you spend time looking at it, especially when you see it from the beginning to the end.
entry.tran: 看，观看(电视节目、比赛等)

example.ex: I'd stayed up late to watch the film...
They spent a great deal of time watching television.
example.tran: 他们很多时间都看电视了。

entry.def: If you watch a situation or event, you pay attention to it or you are aware of it, but you do not influence it.
entry.tran: 对…保持关注;掌握…的情况

example.ex: Human rights groups have been closely watching the case...
example.tran: 人权组织一直在密切关注此案。

example.ex: Annoyed commuters could only watch as the departure time ticked by.
example.tran: 随着发车时间一点点过去，恼怒的上班族只能干瞪眼。

entry.def: If you watch people, especially children or animals, you are responsible for them, and make sure that they are not in danger.
entry.tran: 照看，看护(尤指孩子或动物)

example.ex: Parents can't be expected to watch their children 24 hours a day.
example.tran: 父母不可能每天24小时照看孩子。

entry.def: If you watch someone, you follow them secretly or spy on them.

example.ex: Ella was scared that someone was watching her...
example.tran: 有个人一直在监视埃拉，这让她很害怕。

example.ex: I always had the feeling we were being watched.
example.tran: 我总感觉我们被监视了。

entry.def: If you tell someone to watch a particular person or thing, you are warning them to be careful that the person or thing does not get out of control or do something unpleasant.

example.ex: You really ought to watch these quiet types...
example.tran: 你真的应该留神这些寡言少语的人。

example.ex: If you're watching the calories, don't have mayonnaise.
example.tran: 如果你在意卡路里的摄入量，就不要吃蛋黄酱。

entry.def: A watch is a period of carefully looking and listening, often while other people are asleep and often as a military duty, so that you can warn them of danger or an attack.

example.ex: I had the first watch that May evening.
example.tran: 我第一次执行警戒任务是在那个五月的晚上。

entry.def: If someone keeps watch, they look and listen all the time, while other people are asleep or doing something else, so that they can warn them of danger or an attack.

example.ex: Jose, as usual, had climbed a tree to keep watch.
example.tran: 乔斯像往常一样爬到树上放哨。

entry.def: If you keep watch on events or a situation, you pay attention to what is happening, so that you can take action at the right moment.

example.ex: US officials have been keeping close watch on the situation.
example.tran: 美国官员一直密切注意着事态的发展。

entry.def: You say 'watch it' in order to warn someone to be careful, especially when you want to threaten them about what will happen if they are not careful.

example.ex: 'Now watch it, Patsy,' the Sergeant told her.

entry.def: If someone is on watch, they have the job of carefully looking and listening, often while other people are asleep and often as a military duty, so that they can warn them of danger or an attack.
entry.tran: （通常指军队夜间的）警戒，值夜

example.ex: Apart from two men on watch in the engine-room, everyone was asleep.
example.tran: 除了两个人在机房值班外，其他人都在睡觉。

entry.def: If you are on the watch for something, you are expecting it to happen and you therefore pay attention to events so that you will notice it when it does happen.

example.ex: Environmentalists will be on the watch for damage to wildlife.
example.tran: 环境保护主义者将会密切关注对野生动物造成的伤害。

entry.def: If someone is being kept under watch, they are being guarded or observed all the time.
entry.tran: 受到保卫;受到监视;被密切关注

entry.def: You say to someone 'you watch' or 'just watch' when you are predicting that something will happen, and you are very confident that it will happen as you say.

example.ex: You watch. Things will get worse before they get better.
example.tran: 看着吧，事情在好转之前会先恶化。

entry.def: A watch is a small clock which you wear on a strap on your wrist, or on a chain.

means.word_mean: 2. a period of time (4 or 2 hours) during which some of a ship's crew are on duty
3. a purposeful surveillance to guard or observe
4. the period during which someone (especially a guard) is on duty
5. a person employed to watch for something to happen
6. a devotional watch (especially on the eve of a religious festival)
2. follow with the eyes or the mind;

sentences.sentence: "Keep an eye on the baby, please!"
"She followed the men with the binoculars"
"This program will be seen all over the world"
"They watched as the murderer was executed"

means.word_mean: 5. be vigilant, be on the lookout, be on one's guard, be careful;

sentences.sentence: "Watch how the dog chases the cats away"

means.word_mean: 7. find out, learn, or determine with certainty, usually by making an inquiry or other effort;

sentences.sentence: "I want to see whether she speaks French"
"Check whether the train leaves on time"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English wæcce 'watchfulness', wæccende 'remaining awake'; related to wake. The sense 'small timepiece' probably developed by way of a sense 'alarm device attached to a clock'

sentences.cn: 如果你在意卡路里的摄入量，就不要吃蛋黄酱。

sentences.cn: 我第一次执行警戒任务是在那个五月的晚上。
sentences.en: I had the first watch that May evening.

sentences.cn: 乔斯像往常一样爬到树上放哨。
sentences.en: Jose, as usual, had climbed a tree to keep watch.

sentences.cn: 美国官员一直密切注意着事态的发展。
sentences.en: US officials have been keeping close watch on the situation.

sentences.cn: “留点神，帕齐。”中士提醒她。
sentences.en: 'Now watch it, Patsy,' the Sergeant told her.

sentences.cn: 除了两个人在机房值班外，其他人都在睡觉。
sentences.en: Apart from two men on watch in the engine-room, everyone was asleep.

sentences.cn: 环境保护主义者将会密切关注对野生动物造成的伤害。
sentences.en: Environmentalists will be on the watch for damage to wildlife.

sentences.cn: 看着吧，事情在好转之前会先恶化。
sentences.en: You watch. Things will get worse before they get better.

sentences.cn: 他注视着那所房子里的动静。
sentences.en: He watched the house for signs of activity.

sentences.cn: 他注视着那所房子里的动静。
sentences.en: He watched for signs of activity in the house.

sentences.cn: 我们注视着下一步要发生的事情。
sentences.en: We watched to see what would happen next.

sentences.cn: 他们注视着公共汽车消失在远方。
sentences.en: They watched the bus disappear into the distance.

sentences.cn: 政府正在密切注视着形势的发展。
sentences.en: The government is keeping a close watch on how the situation develops.

sentences.cn: 愿我的祖先注视着我!
sentences.en: May my ancestors watch over me!

sentences.cn: 环顾一下四周,你会发现有人已经在远处注视了你很久.
sentences.en: Look around and you soon that someone very special has been watching you from afar.

sentences.cn: 她一边说一边注视着他换挡时前臂弯曲的样子.
sentences.en: As she spoke, she watched the muscles in his forearm flex when he shifted gears.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 廊桥遗梦

sentences.cn: 我注视着汤姆, 看见他肩膀后面那团肌肉在上衣下面紧张起来.
sentences.en: Watching Tom, I saw the wad of muscle back of his shoulder tighten under his coat.

sentences.cn: 密切注视岛上发生的一切事情.
sentences.en: Keep a close watch on everything that happened on the island.

sentences.cn: 我注视着爬山者下到山谷里去了.
sentences.en: I watched the climbers come down into the valley.

sentences.cn: 在她丈夫承认与莫尼卡·莱温斯基有染后, 希拉里明白大家都在注视着她.
sentences.en: After her husband's admission of an affair with Monica Lewinsky , she knew everybody was watching her.

sentences.cn: 他注视那辆车是如此地专心,以至于他的朋友来了都没有看到.
sentences.en: He had been so absorbed in watching the car passing by that he didn't notice his friends coming.

sentences.cn: 警方密切注视着他的动向.
sentences.en: The police are keeping a watch on his movement.

sentences.cn: 叛逆者现在目不转睛地注视着飞驰的景色.
sentences.en: The traitor narrowly watched the speeding landscape.

sentences.cn: 在观众们的注视下, 我弯下膝盖,摆了一个我最棒的摇滚明星姿势.
sentences.en: As the crowd watched, I bent my knees and gave my best rock star pose.

sentences.cn: 我注视着潜艇慢慢潜入水中.
sentences.en: I watched the submarine gradually submerging.

sentences.cn: 他注视着凯特的头发随着她的摇头而波状起伏.
sentences.en: Kate shook her head and he watched her hair ripple with the movement.

sentences.cn: 三号陪审员停止挣扎,怒目直视八号,所有陪审员都默默地注视着他.
sentences.en: Juror No.3 stops struggling now and stares at No.8 and all the jurors watch in silence.

sentences.cn: 她看着孩子们横过了马路(注视着全过程).
sentences.en: She watched the children cross the road the action from start to finish.

sentences.cn: 她焦急地注视着他的脸.
sentences.en: She watched his face anxiously.

sentences.cn: 维尔福密切地注视着他的脸和嘴唇, 等待检查的结果.
sentences.en: Villefort, closely watching his countenance and his lips, awaited the result of the examination.

sentences.cn: 迈克尔站在起居室的窗口,注视着卡罗在林荫道附近溜达.
sentences.en: Michael stood in the window of his living room and watched Carlo strolling around the mall.

sentences.cn: 特工处长惴惴不安地注视着那股烟.
sentences.en: The Chief of the Secret Service watched the smoke with apprehension.

sentences.cn: 他注视着人群走过.
sentences.en: He was watch ing the crowd go by.

sentences.cn: 在这过程中,她感觉到他们友善的眼睛在注视着她.
sentences.en: During the process she could feel their friendly eyes watching her.

sentences.cn: 当他的两只大拇指在膝盖上不停地转动时,他呆头呆脑地注视着.
sentences.en: He watched in amazement while his thumbs rolled over and over on his lap.

sentences.cn: 随着时间的流逝,他坐在那儿,注视着天空.
sentences.en: He sat and watched the sky as time went by.

sentences.cn: 警察们正在密切注视着嫌疑犯.
sentences.en: The police are watching the suspect closely.

sentences.cn: 瑞德若有所思地注视着韦德那张小脸, 发现这孩子在难过.
sentences.en: Rhett, watching Wade's face with meditative eyes, saw the boy flinch.

sentences.cn: 你注意看我的动作，然后试着做。
sentences.en: Watch what I do, then you try.

sentences.cn: 出纳员接到要求，要注意伪钞。
sentences.en: The cashiers were asked to watch out for forged banknotes.

sentences.cn: 美国官员一直密切注意着事态的发展。
sentences.en: US officials have been keeping close watch on the situation.

sentences.cn: 她满怀怜悯地看着他工作,注意到他越来越需要常常休息.
sentences.en: With compassionate eyes, she watched him working and saw the rest times grow more numerous.

sentences.cn: 同时,要注意你的竞争对手朝你开火.
sentences.en: Watch out when your competition fires at you.

sentences.cn: 当你一踏进邮局不要忘了抽张号码排并注意看著电子版(上的号码显示).
sentences.en: When you enter a post office, don't forget to take a number and watch the board.

sentences.cn: 熔岩巨人——可以让你的宠物上,但是要注意它的血.
sentences.en: Molten Giant – Send in your pet but watch his health.

sentences.cn: 滑行道相当狭窄,注意你的速度.
sentences.en: Taxiway is quite narrow watch your speed.

sentences.cn: 医院密切注意婴儿的健康状况.
sentences.en: The hospital keeps ( a ) close watch on the babies'health.

sentences.cn: 每当boss下潜时注意看你的仇恨.
sentences.en: Watch your aggro when he goes under!

sentences.cn: 你们都注意警戒了 吗 ?过几分钟女王就要从这条路通过了!
sentences.en: Are you all watching out? The Queen will come this way in a few minutes!

sentences.cn: 我纳闷,索皮是不是为了给她时间,让她注意它而停步.
sentences.en: I began to wonder if he was pausing to give her time to watch him.

sentences.cn: 我们必须注意股票市场的运作.
sentences.en: We must watch the performance of the stock market.

sentences.cn: 你在马路上走要注意驶来的车辆.
sentences.en: You should watch the oncoming traffic when you are walking along a road.

sentences.cn: 他们一下也顾不得是不是会引起克洛夫特的注意了.
sentences.en: They loosed the covert fear that Croft would be watching them.

sentences.cn: 记着注意大小写! 现在让我们建个表来存储你的结果吧.
sentences.en: Remember to watch capitalization! Now let's create a table in which to store your results.

sentences.cn: 请再来一遍, 但注意你的发音.
sentences.en: Again, please, but watch your pronunciation.

sentences.cn: 那天中午,他心怀鬼胎地注意运动俱乐部的那些人.
sentences.en: He suspiciously watched the men at the Athletic Club that noon.

sentences.cn: 第三部分:撰写时的注意事项.
sentences.en: What to Watch Out for When Writing.

sentences.cn: 你需要注意的最后一件事情是: 安全.
sentences.en: One final thing you need to watch out for: security.

sentences.cn: 因此他谨慎小心,做工作时特别注意.
sentences.en: So he watched his step and went about his job with great care.

sentences.cn: 注意别让孩子去触摸那根电线.
sentences.en: Watch in case that the child touches that electric wire.

sentences.cn: 密切注意敌人动向.
sentences.en: Keep a close watch on the enemy's movements.

sentences.cn: 注意点: 在餐馆的禽蛋.
sentences.en: Watch out for: Eggs served at restaurants.

sentences.cn: 这一现象的出现要求我们相关部门要更加注意昆虫袭击及对此袭击及时做出报告分析.
sentences.en: It urges concerned departments to watch closely at the pest attack and report in time.

sentences.cn: 注意别让他骗了你.
sentences.en: Watch that he doesn't cheat you.

sentences.cn: 妈妈叮嘱我注意交通安全.
sentences.en: Mother keeps warning me about watching the traffic.

sentences.cn: 横穿街道时要注意车辆.
sentences.en: When you cross the street, watch out for cars.

sentences.cn: 正在起居室里看电视的明美也注意到他的归来.
sentences.en: Minmei was watching TV in the living room and she immediately noticed that he had entered.

sentences.cn: 应严加看守, 小心戒备.
sentences.en: To be kept in strict solitary confinement, and to be closely watched and guarded.

sentences.cn: 他们就带著看守的兵同去 、 封了石头 、 将坟墓把守妥当.
sentences.en: So they went, and made the sepulchre sure , sealing the stone, and setting a watch.

sentences.cn: 如果两个巫婆要看守两只手表, 那么哪个巫婆会看守哪只手表?
sentences.en: If two witches would watch two watches, which witch would watch which watch?

sentences.cn: 千百年来,日本人过的日子就好比是衣衫不周的看守人看守着贵重的珠宝.
sentences.en: For thousand years or more the Japanese had lived like seedy caretakers watching over precious jewels.

sentences.cn: 其他人走开去观察小岛, 留下两个人看守小船.
sentences.en: Others walked away to look at the island, and two men stayed to watch boat.

sentences.cn: 尼尼微阿、那打碎邦国的上来攻击你. 你要看守保障、谨防道路 、 使腰强壮 、 大大勉力.
sentences.en: An attacker advances against you, Nineveh. Guard watch the road, brace yourselves , marshal all your strength!

sentences.cn: 要把阿刚斯看守的东西偷走是不的.
sentences.en: So it could not have been easy steal away anything that Argus was watching.

sentences.cn: 今晚轮到我值班看守帆船.
sentences.en: It's the start of my night watch on Pangaea.

sentences.cn: 他由一个民兵看守着.
sentences.en: He was watched over by a militiaman.

sentences.cn: 飞机场比任何其他地方看守得更严密.
sentences.en: Airports were more closely watched than anyplace else.

sentences.cn: 投手投, 俘获器捉住和看守人手表.
sentences.en: The pitcher pitches, the catcher catches and watcher watches.

sentences.cn: 这里的狱卒总是在看守犯人的时候喝酒.
sentences.en: Warders here always drink when watching the prisoners.

sentences.cn: 派人在旁彻夜看守.
sentences.en: Set a man to watch all night.

sentences.cn: 路加福音2:8在伯利恒之野地里有牧羊人, 夜间按着更次看守羊群.
sentences.en: There were shepherds abiding in the field, keeping watch over their flocks by night.

sentences.cn: 公爵把他看守得很严.
sentences.en: The duke keeps a close watch upon him.

sentences.cn: 哨兵们轮流看守.
sentences.en: The sentries alternate their watch.

sentences.cn: 有关部门除了将这些建筑恢复原貌外,还将在1号营房和日军看守房内进行陈列展览.
sentences.en: Except these buildings, an exhibition will be launched in No.1 Barrack and Japanese watch room.

sentences.cn: 城中巡逻看守的人遇见我, 打了我,伤了我.
sentences.en: The person , who patrol to watch in 7 cities, meets me, beat me and harmed me.

sentences.cn: 尽管房子有人看守, 窃贼还是逃跑了.
sentences.en: In spite of the watch on the house, the thief escaped.

sentences.cn: 我只要看守着他, 我就知道他们.
sentences.en: By watching him. I will know them.

sentences.cn: 没有人在看守他或为他哭泣.
sentences.en: There was no one to watch or weep for him.

sentences.cn: 夜间他们用受过特殊驯练的狗看守羊群.
sentences.en: They use specially trained dogs to watch over their sheep at night.

sentences.cn: 我们严密看守囚犯.
sentences.en: We keep a close watch on the prisoners.

sentences.cn: 那正像托狼看守绵羊;那就等于引狼入室.
sentences.en: It's like trusting a wolf to watch over sheep.

sentences.cn: 警方已在旅馆外面布置人监视。
sentences.en: The police have mounted a watch outside the hotel.

sentences.cn: 有个人一直在监视埃拉，这让她很害怕。
sentences.en: Ella was scared that someone was watching her...

sentences.cn: 我总感觉我们被监视了。
sentences.en: I always had the feeling we were being watched.

sentences.cn: 我其中一个手下在监视她,以确保她是可信赖的.
sentences.en: One of my guys was watching to make sure she was straight up.

sentences.cn: 我是南方公园脆弱生态系统的监视员.
sentences.en: I'm the person who watches over the delicate ecosystem of South Park.

sentences.cn: 由于总有人在连续不断地监视他们, 他们只能谈论过去的事.
sentences.en: Since there was always someone keeping watch on them, they about only the old days.

sentences.cn: 有人在房子外边监视.
sentences.en: There is someone watching outside the house.

sentences.cn: 警方监视着他常去的酒吧.
sentences.en: The police watched the bars which he was known to resort.

sentences.cn: 意识到被监视, 她谨慎地抬头一看.
sentences.en: Aware of still being watched, she glanced up cautiously.

sentences.cn: 为何不将变量或表达式添加到“监视”窗口?
sentences.en: Why not add the variable or expression to the Watch window?

sentences.cn: 会员们确信,政府代理人已经混入他们的团体来监视他们.
sentences.en: Members are convinced government agents have infiltrated the group to watch them.

sentences.cn: 他们严密监视他,惟恐他会逃脱.
sentences.en: They watched him closely in case he should escape.

sentences.cn: 陈女士称, 宣布大流行意味着各国必须严密监视流感病毒.
sentences.en: The announcement, Chan said, means that countries keep a close watch on the virus.

sentences.cn: 电子监视器将对公共场所进行监视,因此犯罪活动可能很少.
sentences.en: Electronic monitors would watch over the public areas so that there would be little crime.

sentences.cn: 如果这些假设的外星人继续监视着我们, 他们在今后几十年内会见证到什么?
sentences.en: If they to keep watch, what might these hypothetical aliens witness in the next few decades?

sentences.cn: 迪沙佛在监视器上看到了杰克审讯维克托的经过, 他同意将维克托转移.
sentences.en: DeSalvo , who was watching Jack's interrogation on the monitors, agrees to move Victor.

sentences.cn: 老师们也监视着用手机短信作弊的行为.
sentences.en: Teachers also watch for cheating by text message.

sentences.cn: 他们在上下左右所有地方都放置了守卫, 但是他们担心他会继续监视我.
sentences.en: They've got wards up and all, but they worry that he'll keep watching me.

sentences.cn: 调试器在“监视”窗口中接受大多数合法的语言表达式.
sentences.en: The debugger accepts most valid language expressions in a Watch window.

sentences.cn: 警察监视着那逃犯常去的各个咖啡馆.
sentences.en: The police watched the cafes to which the wanted man was known to resort.

sentences.cn: 他们收到了监视他的命令.
sentences.en: They had received instructions to watch him.

sentences.cn: 不时我都有种感觉她 就是 不断监视著我.
sentences.en: Sometimes I get the feeling she's watching over me.

sentences.cn: 所以我们监视门卫,确保你们关掉手电筒.
sentences.en: So we'll watch out for the guards to make sure you cut them off.

sentences.cn: 她在邮件里说,别告诉任何人, 他们正在监视你.
sentences.en: Tell no one, she says to him in her note, they are watching.

sentences.cn: 有一天,当那个妇女进来时,该店里的人比通常少一些, 所以侦探比较容易监视她.
sentences.en: One day there were fewer people in the shop than usual when the woman came in, so it was easier for the detective to watch her.

sentences.cn: 让一天使监视你, 但它回去问为什么.
sentences.en: Sent an angel to watch over you last night, but it came back.

sentences.cn: 在最为紧急的时刻,我们轮流监视着那个地方.
sentences.en: At the most critical juncture we took turns in watching that point.

sentences.cn: 我想为那些监视你房子的警察们做点什么.
sentences.en: I had to do a few things to that state trooper, the one watching your house.

sentences.cn: 你想监视他 呀 ,那他可要把你的名字记在他的小黑名单里.
sentences.en: You want to watch him. He'll have you down in his little black book.

sentences.cn: 他们又昼夜在城门守候要杀他.
sentences.en: And they watched the gates day and night to kill him.

sentences.cn: 猎人守候着兔子从洞里出来.
sentences.en: The hunter watched for the hare to come out of the burrow.

sentences.cn: 贪婪的国王守候着每一条大路和小径,寻找新的财富.
sentences.en: Now the king watched every road and byway in search of new wealth.

sentences.cn: 有一天上午,我守候到你们的确全都出了门,便留下了我的名片.
sentences.en: I watched you all safely out of the house one morning and left my name.

sentences.cn: 布沙尼长老一直守候到天亮, 然后没有同任何人打招呼径自离开了.
sentences.en: The Abb é Busoni had watched till daylight, and then left without calling any one.

sentences.cn: “我，”他以富有诗意的语言结尾，“将守候着你，直至晨光初露。”
sentences.en: "I," he finished poetically, "will watch over you to the break of day."

sentences.cn: 美国官员一直密切注意着事态的发展。
sentences.en: US officials have been keeping close watch on the situation.

sentences.cn: 当与我们有交往的泰国领导人被撤换时,我们就要密切注意.
sentences.en: We needed to watch carefully when the Thai leaders associated with us would be replaced.

sentences.cn: 医院密切注意婴儿的健康状况.
sentences.en: The hospital keeps ( a ) close watch on the babies'health.

sentences.cn: 我们必须密切注意存货,才不会有货品短缺的问题.
sentences.en: We must watch our inventory closely so that we don't have a shortage of products.

sentences.cn: 我们必须密切注意金融市场的发展.
sentences.en: We keep a close watch on the development of the financial market.

sentences.cn: 正密切注意那里的局势.
sentences.en: The situation is being closely watched.

sentences.cn: 密切注意敌人动向.
sentences.en: Keep a close watch on the enemy's movements.

sentences.cn: 密切注意是否有跳蚤在宠物身上.温热的天气给跳蚤提供了很好的生存环境.
sentences.en: Watch out for fleas and ticks that may infest your pet.

sentences.cn: 要密切注意病人病情可能突然变化.
sentences.en: Be on the watch for sudden change in the patient's condition.

sentences.cn: 政府正在密切注意该政党的活动.
sentences.en: The government is keeping a close watch on the activity of that political party.

sentences.cn: 请到网站的最新活动密切注意我们随时更新的最新讯息.
sentences.en: Please watch the Activities listing for updates on these events.

sentences.cn: 钱被窃后他就一直在密切注意你.
sentences.en: He kept watch on you ever after the money was stolen.

sentences.cn: 警方正密切注意嫌疑犯的行动.
sentences.en: The police are watching out for the suspect.

sentences.cn: 政府正在“密切”注意该政党的活动.
sentences.en: The government is a close watch on the activities of that political party.

sentences.cn: 警察密切注意着那个可疑人物的行动.
sentences.en: The police are watching the movements of the suspicious character carefully.

sentences.cn: “如果我是你，”她主动建议说，“我会密切注意自己的女儿。”
sentences.en: "If I were you," she adds by way of some unsolicited advice, "I'd watch out for that girl of yours."

sentences.cn: 我们会密切注意从墨尔本飞来的每架飞机。
sentences.en: We'd be watching every plane coming in from Melbourne.

sentences.cn: 我们会密切注意事情的任何进展。
sentences.en: We'll be watching for any developments.

sentences.cn: 美国官员一直密切注意着事态的发展。
sentences.en: US officials have been keeping close watch on the situation.

sentences.cn: 这些人上班是值夜班.
sentences.en: The men go on watch when they were working.

sentences.cn: 值夜班的人很快就要来值班了.
sentences.en: The night watch comes on duty soon.

sentences.cn: 我希望我不用值夜班.
sentences.en: Wish I didn't have to go on watch.

sentences.cn: 值夜班的人在下午6点接替值日班的人.
sentences.en: The night watch relieved the day watch at 6 p.m.

sentences.cn: 我一个小时后值班。
sentences.en: I go on watch in an hour.

sentences.cn: 除了两个人在机房值班外，其他人都在睡觉。
sentences.en: Apart from two men on watch in the engine-room, everyone was asleep.

sentences.cn: 一天晚上, 约莫十一点钟的时候, 一个值班的雷契先生的手下人下来取他的外套.
sentences.en: One night, about eleven o'clock, a man of Mr. Riach's watch came below for his jacket.

sentences.cn: 他就是那个值班的人.
sentences.en: He is the man on watch.

sentences.cn: 随着配电变电站自动化水平的提高, 一般都趋向于无人值班的方式.
sentences.en: With the development of automation in distribution substation , it will need not anyone to keep watch.

sentences.cn: 尽管有值班人对著房子一拥而上, 小偷还是逃了.
sentences.en: In spite of the watch set on the house, the thief escaped.

sentences.cn: 我当时正在旗舰上服役,夜幕降临时,我来到舰桥上值班.
sentences.en: I was serving on the battleship and was on watch on the bridge as night fell.

sentences.cn: 值班人正在看电视上的时钟以此来校对他的手表.
sentences.en: The watch is watching the clock on TV in order to set his watch.

sentences.cn: 值班的警卫必须紧握手中枪.
sentences.en: The guard on watch must hold to his gun.

sentences.cn: 今晚轮到我值班看守帆船.
sentences.en: It's the start of my night watch on Pangaea.

sentences.cn: 值夜班的人很快就要来值班了.
sentences.en: The night watch comes on duty soon.

sentences.cn: 如果他认为她没有责任感,就不会让她去值班.
sentences.en: He wouldn't put her on watch if he didn't think she could handle the responsibility.

sentences.cn: 我想只有我自己来承担这个责任了,因为这事是在我值班的时候发生的.
sentences.en: I guess I have to bear the blame since it happened on my watch.

sentences.cn: 值班轮机员应在何时叫轮机长?
sentences.en: When will an engineer in charge of watch call the Chief Engineer?

sentences.cn: 该他到灯塔上值班.
sentences.en: He was to keep watch in the lighthouse.

sentences.cn: 他在站岗(放哨)(他站在那儿值班).
sentences.en: He was standing on watch.

sentences.cn: 孩子们兴趣浓厚地观看小丑表演.
sentences.en: The children watched the clowns with keen delight.

sentences.cn: 一个印度的穆斯林家庭正在观看美国总统奥巴马在开罗大学发表的划时代的演讲.
sentences.en: An Indian Muslim family watches US President Barack Obama deliver his landmark speech at Cairo University.

sentences.cn: 全国上下中国人通过国家电视广播中央电视台观看开幕式.
sentences.en: Across the country, Chinese watched the ceremonies on state broadcaster China Central Television.

sentences.cn: 美联社记者报道留在巴黎的人在一片寂静中观看了入城式.
sentences.en: The people left in Paris watched the entry in silence, reports the Associated Press correspondents.

sentences.cn: 就我看来, 你是戏中惟一值得观看的演员.
sentences.en: For my money, you were the only actor in the play who was worth watching.

sentences.cn: 观看乒乓球比赛的人比看排球赛的人多.
sentences.en: There are more people watching the table tennis game than the volleyball one.

sentences.cn: 当你在观看而不是在参与“为驴安尾 ” 这种游戏时,你会发现真是太有趣了. (接现在分词)
sentences.en: Pin the Tail on the Donkey always fun when you're watching rather than pinning.

sentences.cn: 他极有兴趣地观看斗狗.
sentences.en: He watched the canine warfare with the deepest interest.

sentences.cn: 英国人热爱比赛,全身心地参加或者观看各种赛事.
sentences.en: The Brits love their games and play and watch them with fierce , competitive dedication.

sentences.cn: 虽然我已经很忙碌, 我仍然每天晚上都观看这些比赛.
sentences.en: In spite of my busyness, I found myself staying up almost every night watching the games.

sentences.cn: 孩子们喜欢观看动物, 尤其是猴子.
sentences.en: The children enjoyed watching the animals, the monkeys.

sentences.cn: 它喜欢观看我们用无数喂食器和鸟澡盆吸引到院子里的鸟.
sentences.en: He loved watching the birds we attracted to our yard with numerous feeders and birdbaths.

sentences.cn: 有些在人们观看时就会改变颜色.
sentences.en: Some seem to change colour as they are being watched.

sentences.cn: 我们从高处观看游行.
sentences.en: We watched the parade from our perch.

sentences.cn: 对她来说,观看女儿在节目中表演舞蹈是件乐事.
sentences.en: It is a delight for her to watch her daughter dance in the show.

sentences.cn: 我熬夜观看比赛.
sentences.en: I stopped up to watch the match.

sentences.cn: 朱莉和迈克尔正在观看史蒂文足球赛的决赛.
sentences.en: Julie and Michael are watching Steven's final soccer game.

sentences.cn: 克莱会跟其他教练们观看研究比赛录像,并制定有效的比赛计划.
sentences.en: Cleamons will study, watch more film with the coaches and devise a plan they hope works.

sentences.cn: 中共中央政治局委员 、 国务委员刘延东观看了演出.
sentences.en: Member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, State Councilor Liu watched the performance.

sentences.cn: 她就此辍学, 整日观看刘德华演唱会的影碟.
sentences.en: She quIt'school, and spent day after day watching videos of Andy Lau's concerts.

sentences.cn: 在海滩上漫步、观看晚霞落日是我的最爱.
sentences.en: Walking on the beach and watching the sunset is an all time favorite for me!

sentences.cn: 篱笆上的洞使我们能够观看那美丽的场景.
sentences.en: The hole in the fence enabled us to watch that beautiful scene.

sentences.cn: B还有数百万人通过电视观看比赛.
sentences.en: B And millions watching it on TV.

sentences.cn: 许多棒球迷们一直观看电视.
sentences.en: Many baseball fans go along to watch television.

sentences.cn: 我们观看队伍走过.
sentences.en: We watched the passing of the procession.

sentences.cn: 接时将会有成千上万的人观看.
sentences.en: There will be thousands watching it.

sentences.cn: 罗马人喜欢观看战车赛.
sentences.en: The Romans liked watching chariot racing.

sentences.cn: 许多足球迷到日本和韩国观看世界杯比赛.
sentences.en: Many football fans travelled to Japan and South Korea to watch the World Cup.

sentences.cn: 这种电路用于晚上对于风速或强度的提示标记进行照明, 便于行人观看.
sentences.en: This circuit for the speed or intensity at the Tip Markers lighting, pedestrian easy to watch.

sentences.cn: 我有几个年长的家人昨晚观看了整个竞选过程.
sentences.en: I had a few people in my family over last night to watch the whole thing.

Sentence.sentence: So I've watched a lot of children—talking, playing, arguing, eating, studying, and being young.
